direction.raw_text: a slightly obese, nearsighted man in his seventies.

dialogue.raw_text: Is he real? Oh yeah -- Absolutely.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I haven't talked about it for years, you know? (looks at the camera) Everyone called me crazy...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But I have the negative.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get ready, 3-2-1... Roll tape.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It all started back in  44. I was a Corps photographer aboard an allied submarine...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: s hands again paw through a bunch of negatives, again under a red light. Now, at 21, he's wedged in a submarine corridor, a crowded maze of pipes and gauges.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: mm still cameras dangle from his neck. He shrinks back as a squad of MARINES hustles past him, loading weapons.

dialogue.raw_text: ...off the coast of Scotland. Classified mission. I was 21...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . WHITMAN, 44, tough as nails, pushes through, his uniform soaked in sweat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whitman continues down the passageway until he reaches a small...

dialogue.raw_text: We had an English civilian on board. Not much older than me but already an advisor to President Roosevelt. "Paranormal" advisor, I kid you not --
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Within, an incongruously proper young Englishman "reading" an ancient set of Tarot cards.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: His name was Trevor. Profesor Trevor -- WHITMAN -- Broom! Topside, now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: is a gaunt, olive-skinned man in his late twenties. In his hands, a tarot deck. He turns the cards face up: THE FOOL, THE MOON...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Broom grabs a worn-down wooden box full of books and amulets. It has a leather strap that allows him to carry it, much like a carpenter's tool box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He moves away. Broom takes a small box and a few amulets. Before exiting, he pauses and tensely turns the last TAROT CARD: THE DEVIL.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The sooner we're done, the better.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is an important mission, Sgt. Whitman. I hope you realize that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh -- you don't wanna know what I think. Topside, now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . SCOTLAND - TUNNEL - NIGHT Super: OCTOBER 9, 1944, SCOTLAND. It's raining like hell now. Soldiers move through a short tunnel carved into the mountain. Whitman signals his men to spread out, then comes alongside Broom.

dialogue.raw_text: Sgt. Whitman!! Sgt. Whitman!! May I have a word??

dialogue.raw_text: (impatient) What is it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: In private, if you don't mind...

direction.raw_text: Whitman locks and loads an automatic.

dialogue.raw_text: Your men -- They'll need these --

dialogue.raw_text: Here. You'll need one of these.

dialogue.raw_text: I abhor violence. (Whitman moves away) Sergeant Whitman, I hope you don't think me mad -- WHITMAN Three days too late for that one, "professor."

direction.raw_text: hauls his tripod and gear and joins the troops on the move. Broom catches up with Whitman.

direction.raw_text: Reaching a slope, Matlin sets down his camera. Turning, he sees lights.

dialogue.raw_text: You're wasting our time: There's nothing on this island but sheep and rocks.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ruins. Not rocks. The remains of Trondham Abbey. Built on an intersection of Ley Lines, the boundaries between our world and the other -- WHITMAN (interrupts him) What a load of crap. Hell, a week ago I hadn't even heard the word parabnormal -- BROOM "Paranormal" (Whitman moves on) But -- you read the transmission.

dialogue.raw_text: Half transmission. Nonsense -- German ghost stories!

dialogue.raw_text: I have seen ghosts, Whitman.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, I'll bet you have.

dialogue.raw_text: Sweet Jesus.

direction.raw_text: . AMONG THE RUINS - NIGHT A dozen German soldiers swiftly assemble a large steel MACHINE. The work is monitored by a spindly Nazi in BLACK LEATHER, his face covered by an odd gas mask: KROENEN.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The freak in the gas mask -- BROOM Karl Ruprecht Kroenen, one of the Reich's top Scientists. Head of the Thule Occult Society.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: He lowers a pair of binoculars and passes them to Whitman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The RADIOMAN cranks a transmitter to life.

dialogue.raw_text: If he's here, this is worse than I thought.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to the radio man) Air and sea backup. What's closest?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Londonderry, sir. Forty minutes away.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We don't have forty minutes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Kroenen throws a switch: On the machine, dozens of gears respond! Steam pistons thrust copper rails upright, lifting two mighty metal rings, not unlike a gyroscope. Kroenen grunts and signals for more floodlights to be turned on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The lights flood an ancient sacristy lined with eroded stone saints. GRIGORY, tall and gaunt, stands naked, arms fully extended.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: No matter what happens to me, you must carry on with the work.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: a severe, ageless Aryan beauty, reverentially drapes an embroidered robe over his bony shoulders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He hands her a small LEATHER-BOUND BOOK. It contains hand- drawn notes and illustrations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He pulls her close, the clouds of their breath mingling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He dips his fingers in a wooden bowl full of blood, then wipes her tears away with a crimson thumb, both a consolation and a ritual.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I will not leave you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, you will... Leave me. Deny me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Never --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This will guide you back to me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I grant you everlasting life, youth and the power to serve me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: an acrid German General, wearing dark SCARLET glasses and LEATHER GLOVES, appears. Looks at his pocket watch. On the gold lid: a SWASTIKA.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: It's time.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . ABBEY RUINS - ALTAR AREA - CEREMONY - NIGHT Grigory walks towards the machine, its colossal steel and copper clockworks gleaming in the floodlights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He strides alongside Grigory and Ilsa, who holds an umbrella to shield her master from the pouring rain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kroenen mutters excitedly as he opens a polished oak box containing a massive gold and copper MECHA-GLOVE. Grigory extends his hand so that KROENEN may fit him with the contraption, which is attached to cables and hoses.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Five years of research and construction, Grigory. Five years!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The furhrer doesn't look kindly on failure.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There will be no failure, General. I promised Herr Hitler a miracle. I'll deliver one.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Americans fan out, unseen. Broom and Whitman dive into a ditch barely in time to avoid a German foot patrol. Other GI's take up positions below a machine gun nest.

direction.raw_text: Grigory walks to the top of the altar, cables trailing behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks down at the machine and whispers -- GRIGORY Ragnarok, Anung Ia Anung. He flexes his fingers and in response -- -- the two metal rings swing around the machine's central axis. TCHINK!!! WHIRRR!!! STEAM escapes from the ducts and pipes. An invisible blast of energy forces the falling rain to swerve momentarily away from Grigory's body. Ilsa signals TWO NAZI SCIENTISTS standing at a control panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One of them inserts a 20 inch SOLID GOLD CYLINDER into the machine. Two openings remain vacant next to it. A blade of light opens in the air! Burning symbols slash the air, like living serpents of fire.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Tonight, We will open a portal and awaken the OGDRU JAHAD: The seven Gods of chaos. (beat) Our enemies will be destroyed. In an instant, all impurity in this world will be razed and from the ashes a new eden will arise.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: More Power!! Don't let the level drop!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The edges of the cosmic slit sizzle with color; an ALIEN GALAXY sparkles on the other side. Suddenly, a work light tears loose and flies in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The six-foot work light tumbles by the massive OGDRU JAHAD: seven egg-like monoliths of unholy origin. Within their translucent walls, horrible creatures lie slumbering. As the light sweeps by, one of the giants opens a filmy eye, and then another, and another, and another... Fleshy tentacles move lazily within their crystalline prison.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grigory screams as his body rises. Veins swell in his neck, his face distorted by ecstasy and pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Someone shoots a photograph.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Matlin, snapping for all he's worth. Whitman pulls him down and pulls out a large bayonet blade.

direction.raw_text: Too late. One of the NAZI SCIENTIST has heard them.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Listen to me, you moron: you do that again, I'll carve you a new --
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Nazi SCIENTIST approaches. Pauses next to the box with the GOLD CYLINDERS.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (fierce whisper, to WHITMAN) Listen to me!!! The portal is open!!! We have to stop them!!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Grigory dangles like a marionette in a new surge of energy. Even the skeptical Von Krupt is in thrall. The NAZI SCIENTIST reaches for a second GOLD CYLINDER. But something else lands next to him: A GRENADE!!! The explosion blows him to pieces. In a few seconds, the squad of Allies storms the area. A hail of bullets cuts down a dozen Nazis. The Allies overrun the machine gun nest as grenades explode everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: shoots wildly, hitting Broom in the leg. But Whitman's bullets rip into the old Nazi's chest. Leaving a trail of blood, Broom crawls to a dead G.I. and grabs a grenade from his belt.

direction.raw_text: !!! Kroenen extends two gleaming blades from twin steel bands on his wrists and takes on an entire group of soldiers, mowing through them with swords spinning like deadly rotors. The steel chops clean through their weapons. Broom pulls the pin and throws the grenade at the generator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !! It wedges itself between two moving tie rods. Kroenen squeals and -- retracting his blades -- lunges after it. The gyrating rails slice through his leather jacket. As his fingers reach the grenade, it EXPLODES!!! Kroenen flies through the air, hitting a stone wall, where two long pieces of shrapnel pin him like an insect. Another rail plunges -- FFFFT!!, like a javelin -- into the earth right next to MATLIN.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Grigory!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Grigory's face is distorted, pulled like ectoplasmic taffy, his body contorting and breaking. The cosmic portal suddenly implodes! Nothing is left but a few burnt rails and the metal glove, empty and smoking. As the Allies approach, the fighting rages on. Grigory and Ilsa are gone. And for now, so is Kroenen. Embedded in the wall where he was pinned, two bloody rails, nothing more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INSIDE THE CHURCH - NIGHT Allied SOLDIERS penetrate the ruins. Matlin helps Broom up.

direction.raw_text: He picks up a sample of white, viscous goo from the outer rings of the smoking machine. Whitman approaches.

direction.raw_text: Broom glances at a 13th century FRESCO depicting heaven and hell.

dialogue.raw_text: It's almost over!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No. It's not.

dialogue.raw_text: Cordon off the area. Something came through.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: From where??!!

direction.raw_text: Still raining. A group of soldiers spreads out, using flashlights to scour through the rubble. Every one of them has a rosary hanging from the bayonet.

direction.raw_text: . INSIDE CHAPEL RUINS - NIGHT Broom hastily bandages his bleeding leg. Matlin and Whitman roam over the debris. Rain POURS through the broken roof.

direction.raw_text: A rustling sound reaches their ears. Matlin readies a handgun as Broom scans the walls with his flashlight. Something moves, accompanied by a loud scrape. Matlin cocks his pistol and nervously approaches a crumbling statue. SCREEEECH!!!! A RED THING jumps into the air!! Instinctively, Matlin shoots at it. The RED THING leaps from arch to arch, followed by a trail of bullet hits. Whitman and other soldiers join them -- MATLIN (to Broom) What the hell was that? An ape?

direction.raw_text: They hear the labored breathing of a living creature.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hissing, the thing cowers between a gargoyle and a stone saint.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Do you believe in hell?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There is a place -- a dark place where evil slumbers and awaits to return. From there it infects our dreams. Our thoughts. Grigory gave us a glance tonight -- MATLIN Grigory -- That's Russian, right? (Broom nods) Thought they were on our side...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Grigory Yefimovich Rasputin -- MATLIN C'mon -- Rasputin??
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Spiritual advisor to the Romanovs. (beat) In 1916, at a dinner in his honor, he was poisoned, shot, stabbed, clubbed, drowned and castrated.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That makes him more than a hundred --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No. It was red. Bright red.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What are you two talking about??
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: A red ape.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's-not-an-ape --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's got a big stone -- in its hand -- BROOM I think that is its hand.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: points his gun at the scarlet shape above. Broom stops him from firing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In deep shadow, the RED THING observes with bright, golden eyes veined with streaks of burnt sienna. Broom slowly fishes a BABY RUTH candy bar from his pocket. Peeling back the wrapper, he slowly waves the candy. The RED THING shrinks back. Broom bites into the candy and chews, noisily smacking his lips. Offers the candy again. This time, out of the dark comes a small FACE, not very different from the stone demons around it. The creature extends its right arm: it's solid stone with tiny runes engraved around the thick, cylindrical wrist. Four articulated stone fingers wiggle, reaching for the chocolate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whitman moves closer. On the wall behind him, a shadow shows the RED THING climbing into Broom's arms. Broom tenderly covers it with a blanket. The stubby fingers snatch the candy. Broom smiles.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Wait --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Jesus! would'ya look at the size of that whammer!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's a boy. Just a baby boy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The soldiers cluster around, curious to see it. Matlin prepares his camera and directs them into a group shot. Broom smiles like a proud new father and embraces the creature, patting him gently. CLICK!!!
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Best photo of my career -- CUT TO:
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: and no one has ever seen it. They keep saying he's not real, but I want to set the record straight before I go. Matlin finally pulls an old 8x10 from a battered portfolio. He smiles, full of memories.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: EXT. INSIDE THE CHURCH - BACK TO '44 - NIGHT BROOM (smiles at the creature)

direction.raw_text: Inside the blanket, Hellboy blinks his bright golden eyes and chews candy, his devilish red tail twitching happily.

dialogue.raw_text: Here. The real picture, not the retouched one in LIFE magazine. (hands over the photograph) This is him. The very same night we found him. The night Broom gave him that name. (beat) Can I say it on TV? He called him --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Look at that. That's a costume. These people amaze me.

direction.raw_text: In the thick of a snowstorm, THREE FIGURES climb the icy steps of a massive rock formation. Super: BIRGAU PASS, MOLDAVIA, PRESENT DAY.

ICE CAVE - MAIN NAVE - DAY A cathedral-like vault that could easily hold a stadium. From an opening somewhere above, eerie blue light streams down on a magnificent labyrinth. A few more fireflies speckle the air, winking on and off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The THREE FIGURES move past cyclopean statues guarding the inhuman architecture. The humans are dwarfed by the monumental scale of the walkways and ramparts.

direction.raw_text: 3 uncovers his face: he's a PEASANT GUIDE.

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, I -- LOBBY GUARD -- Section fifty-one. Step back.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Pardon?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Two steps back, please.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Watch your hands and elbows.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The panel overhead slides shut. A row of safety lights comes on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's in a vast underground area with other elevators moving up and down in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .P.R.D. - CONCRETE CHAMBER 51 - DUSK The elevator stops in a narrow, dark space. Neon lights flicker on, illuminating a circular chamber. PAINTED on the floor is a huge number: 51. Right in front of Myers: a magnificent oak door. Myers knocks on it. No answer. Myers enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers looks around, fascinated: books. An office made of them. The soft glow of green-shaded reading lamps bathes everything in an intimate, warm light. One entire wall is a thick pane of glass, the wall of a huge tank of water. A VOICE crackles through an intercom next to the tank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers jumps, then moves closer to the glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the tank, ABE SAPIEN, a FISH-MAN glides in and out view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers looks at four BOOK STANDS facing the glass. Each supports an open volume. He leans close to the glass, peering intently. Abe reappears. He is slender, dolphin gray, with dark patterns streaking his soft skin. Bright blue eyes shine with intelligence. Behind a thin wound-like mouth, gills are bubbling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe nods. Through a side door, Broom enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers extends his hand in greeting -- MYERS Sir, I'm -- BAM! Abe presses his webbed hand against the glass, closes his eyes -- all three lids. Abe's voice surges from the speaker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Points at a small piece of antique paper, framed on the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Broom uncovers a tray by the tank: Four greenish eggs. Myers gags and reels back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe smiles and takes a subaquatic bow, gracefully nabbing the eggs as they float through the hatch.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Turn the pages, please.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Over here... if you don't mind?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Jesus Christ!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (points at the books) These -- ? You're reading these -- ?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Four books at once. Every day -- as long as I'm here to turn the pages. (smiles) My name's Broom. Professor Trevor Broom.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Agent John T. Myers, Kansas City, 76. "T" stands for Thaddeus, mother's older brother. Scar on your chin happened when you were ten, you still wonder if it's ever going to fade away.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How did it -- BROOM -- He. Not "it."
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Abraham Sapien. Discovered alive in a secret chamber at St. Trinian's Foundling Hospital, Washington.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They took his name from this little inscription that was stuck on his tank.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (reads) Icthyo Sapiens, April 14, 1865.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The day Abraham Lincoln died. Hence "Abe" Sapien.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Rotten eggs, a delicacy. Abe loves them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How does he know so much about me?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Abe possesses a unique frontal lobe. (beat) "Unique." That's a word you'll hear quite a bit around here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where am I -- exactly, Sir?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: As you entered the lobby there was an inscription -- MYERS On the desk, yes. In Latin.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Impressive. Do you remember what it said?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (sighs) "In absentia luci, tenebrae vinciunt..." BROOM "In the absence of light, darkness prevails." For there are things that go bump in the night, Agent Myers. (smiles) We are the ones who bump back.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: .P.R.D. - FREAK CORRIDOR "A" - NIGHT Myers and Broom walk down a corridor. The walls are lined with glass cases containing occult artifacts. Myers eyes a MUMMIFIED HAND, a CLAY GOLEM, a sumptuous PAGAN ALTAR...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He points to an ANCIENT, BROKEN LANCE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He gestures at an ancient LANCE. Next to it: a silver and gold reliquary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They go through a series of pneumatic doors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Workmen are replacing two of the doors. Big dents from an oversized fist have deformed the 2-inch thick metal plates. Myers stares.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They reach a FINAL DOOR. Stainless steel, like a BANK VAULT. Waiting there is AGENT CLAY, a burly guy in a suit, with a cartful of BEEF AND MASHED POTATOES. A dinner pile at least 4 feet high.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Broom hands Myers two BABY RUTH bars and walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Broom signals "no."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The door closes behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clay uses an odd-shaped ELECTRONIC KEY to unlock the door. Three solenoid locks turn. Two steel vertical PISTONS open up.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : Hitler joins "The Thule Society" -- a group of German aristocrats obsessed with the occult.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : he acquires the Spear of Longinus, which pierced the body of Christ. He who holds it becomes invincible.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hitler's power increases tenfold.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: THE BUREAU FOR PARANORMAL RESEARCH AND DEFENSE

dialogue.raw_text: In 1943, President Roosevelt decides to fight back. THE BUREAU FOR PARANORMAL RESEARCH AND DEFENSE is born.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: the occult war finally ends when Adolf Hitler dies.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: you mean. Hitler died in '45.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (enigmatic smile) Did he, now?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Agent Myers, this is Agent Clay. Follow his lead.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're not coming?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I hand-picked you from a roster of over seventy academy graduates. Make me proud.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They're not speaking. Professor Broom had him grounded.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Grounded? Who's grounded?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay. You saw the fish man, right?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, come on in and meet the rest of the family.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Clay pushes the cart into a solid concrete bunker, windowless, austere except for a few SAMURAI suits of ARMOR and WEAPONS. Dozens of CATS wander around; others are curled up on the furniture. There are Zippo's everywhere, from every era. On a sofa (made from the bed of a pickup truck) is a heap of blankets and comic books. All in all, a MEGA BACHELOR PAD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clay points at a torn comic book: HELLBOY, THE UNCANNY. Myers picks it up, looks at the cover: it shows Hellboy -- in a U.S. Uniform, fighting a monstrous ape. Myers watches, amazed, as a bright red TAIL waves in and out of a pool of light about ten feet away. One of the cats playfully paws at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The voice is a deep baritone, chesty and powerful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers gasps, seeing a monumental figure in the shadows, exercising with a 300 lb. Stainless steel DUMBBELL. Crimson biceps like cooked hams. Chomping an unlit CIGAR stub.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agent Clay blushes as he hides his scalp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On a nearby pile of junked TV sets, a loop of Fleischer cartoons and home movies cycles endlessly. One subject appears over and over: an ATTRACTIVE YOUNG WOMAN with a pale face and raven-black hair.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (sotto voce) He gets fed six times a day. He's got a thing for cats. You'll be his nanny, his keeper, his best friend. He never goes out unsupervised -- MYERS Who?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (sotto voce) You're kidding -- HELLBOY Those comics -- They never got the eyes right.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Clay, sotto voce) Oh, Jesus!! Hellboy -- ?? Is real -- CLAY (sotto voce) Yup. Sixty years old by our count. But he doesn't age like we do -- think dog years: He's barely out of his teens.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's with the hair, Clay?? Finally got those implants??
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It'll fill in. Where do you want your dinner, Red? By the couch?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who's the squirt?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Agent Myers is your new liaison.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Got tired of me?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Nah. I'll be around, Red, just back in the field.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: !!! Hellboy lets the dumbbell drop. Instinctively, Myers jumps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers remembers he's holding the Baby Ruths.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy finally enters the light. He's awe-inspiring, with chiseled features, patterned red skin and deep-set golden eyes. Involuntarily, Myers recoils. In spite of himself, Myers is staring at the horn stumps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An ALARM sounds, and a red light blinks on the wall. Myers looks around, bewildered.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I don't want him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Manning says I'm too soft on you -- (sotto voce, nudging Myers) The candy. Give him the candy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh. Uh. Hello. I -- I have these. For you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (realizing) Father's back? (Clay nods) Still angry?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, you did break out -- HELLBOY I wanted to see her. (grunts) It's nobody's business.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It is. You got yourself on TV again.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: "Myers", huh? You have a first name??
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (sotto to Myers) Try not to stare. He hates when people stare.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Uh-oh -- John. (sotto) Staring at what?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: His horns. He files 'em. To "fit in."
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: His what??!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Whatcha looking at, John??
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh-n-no -- I --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Clay) Hey, hey, hey. They're playing our song.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're on the move.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Myers) C'mon, Champ! Happy Halloween!!! You're taking me for a walk!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: An imposing four-story structure, all pillars and pediments. A HALLOWEEN BANNER advertises: MAGICK: THE ANCIENT POWER. Super: THE MACHEN LIBRARY, MANHATTAN Chaos near the entrance: policemen, TV reporters, MOUNTED POLICE. Loud protests from the reporters as a line of black sedan cars are waved through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trailing behind the cars, a GARBAGE TRUCK. On its side a mirrored sign reads: SQUEAKY CLEAN INC. Waste Management Services.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The NYPD has yet to issue a statement. We've got SWAT vans, paramedics, you name it...  and now here's -- a garbage truck -- (double take)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: a garbage truck?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: is driving the truck, with MYERS at his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The crowd parts like the Red Sea for the garbage truck. Dozens of faces are reflected in the truck's mirrored logo. A MOUNTED POLICEMAN rides past the mirrored sides of the truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The MOUNTED POLICEMAN is visible as he rides by. The mirrors are see-through. The back of the truck is a fully-equipped crime lab, crammed with hi-tech gear and low-tech talismans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fits a respirator over his face. It looks like a mechanized Elizabethan collar. Valves bubble and hiss as he inhales liquid through his mouth and out his gills. Hellboy looks out onto the CROWD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy straps on a huge utility belt heavy with amulets, rosaries, horseshoes. From an ashtray he grabs a handful of stogie stubs. Lights one, puts the rest in a pouch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy unlocks a STEEL BOX (STENCILED ON ITS LID: "THE GOOD SAMARITAN") and extracts the meanest-looking, custom-built, double-barrel, blue-finished, handgun ever made. A veritable cannon.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Look at them ugly suckers, Blue. One sheet of glass between them and us.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Story of my life.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I break it, they see us, Happy Halloween. No more hiding. (nostalgic) Outside. I could be outside -- ABE You mean, outside... with her.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't get psychic with me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Nothing psychic about it. You're easy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How am I ever gonna get a girl?? I drive around in a garbage truck
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Liz left us, Red. Take the hint.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (hefting the gun) We don't take hints.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The GARBAGE TRUCK pulls into an interior courtyard and stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: teams spread through the area, expelling uniformed cops and securing the doors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and MOSS -- close a gate, sealing off the area.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From a nearby roof, Agent Lime signals all clear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The truck stops, Clay pulls a lever. Myers watches as the dumpster loader hinges down like a drawbridge, revealing HELLBOY and ABE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe, Clay and Hellboy activate lights on their belts. They BEEP and blink. Hellboy starts walking.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: All areas secured.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (into a handheld radio) Seal the doors. Red and Blue are coming in.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay, boys, let's synch up our locators.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . MACHEN LIBRARY, MAIN LOBBY - NIGHT As BPRD agents clear the area, Clay, Myers, Abe and Hellboy march through the main lobby. On view, various display cases. Two BANNERS flank the marble staircase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Broom stands at the base of the marble staircase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers observes as the red Goliath sheepishly averts his gaze from that of the fragile old man.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (reading a report) At nineteen hundred hours an alarm tripped. B&E. Robbery. Six guards dead -- HELLBOY Hold on -- hold on -- I thought we checked this place. Fakes, and reproductions.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Apparently not everything was fake.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (surprised to see him) Father...?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: They approach an oversize set of brass doors. Abe removes a leather glove from his hand. FWAP!! he spreads his webbed fingers on the door. He closes his three eyelids and concentrates. Two agents arrive with a rolling munitions case. Myers observes as Hellboy opens it and looks over a potpourri of bullets of all colors and shapes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy selects a clip full of bullets and a speed loader.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe quickly starts scanning a few leather-bound volumes of ancient magic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As HELLBOY opens the big doors, a flickering amber glow illuminates him. He steps inside.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: 16th century statue was destroyed. Saint Dionysius the Aeropagite.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who wards off demons.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Smuggled into this country by an overzealous curator. The statue, however, was hollow -- HELLBOY Reliquary -- BROOM A prison. The Vatican deemed its contents dangerous enough to include it on the List of Avignon. Of which we hold a copy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Would'ya look at this babies? Made 'em myself. Holy water, silver shavings, white oak: the works.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (pulling his hand away) Behind this door. A dark entity -- Evil, ancient and hungry.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, well. Lemme go in and say "hi".
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: emergency lamps are on. The exhibits are destroyed; piles of debris are burning. Hellboy walks past a fallen display case. He moves around cautiously. A couple of large carvings and statues startle him. On the floor: boots, half chewed. Bitten belts and shreds of uniforms and hats.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The sickening sound of snapping bones and mastication reaches his ears. Hellboy reacts to a smell, raises his eyes to discover -- A huge pale CREATURE hangs from the ceiling, chewing slowly. SAMMAEL: equipped with powerful arms, a head full of tentacles and two well-muscled hind legs. Most of its face is hidden, but the jaws are shiny with blood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: INT. MAIN CORRIDOR / MACHEN LIBRARY (SET) - NIGHT Abe has found a small, medieval engraving of Sammael in one of the books.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: INT. "MAGIK EXHIBITION" HALL - NIGHT Sammael releases himself, lands on the floor. Part of the neck is exposed: white, slimy skin, cracked like old marble and criss- crossed with blue veins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sammael stands and turns around -- CRACK-KKK!!! His waist twists him 360 degrees!! Screeching, Sammael leaps away!!! Hellboy shoots. The high-caliber ammo rips a few columns apart and finally catches Sammael. The bullet goes through it and destroys a statue and a large window behind him. The monster squeals and goes down. With a rattling cough, it grows still.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (whispers into radio) Blue: It stinks in here -- Finely aged roadkill.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey. Stinky. Kitchen's closed. (beat) Whatcha havin'? Six library guards, raw? Plus belts and boots? Man, you're gonna need some heavy fiber to move that out -- ABE (in earphone) Red, I found something --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's not much here: the entity's name is Sammael, the desolate one, son of Nergal --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hold it -- (beat) Hey, Sammy, whaddayasay we work this out?? Peacefully. I'm not a great shot, but -- (raises his gun) "The Samaritan" here, uses really big bullets, so whadyasay we work this out?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . MACHEN LIBRARY - MAGIK EXHIBIT HALL - NIGHT HELLBOY That's all for you, Sammy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy turns away for a moment. Puts his gun away, like a gunslinger.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (in earpiece) Red -- you need to hear the rest of the information --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Nah -- he's taken care of.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: No, listen this: Sammael, the desolate one, lord of the shadows, son of Nergal -- INT. MACHEN LIBRARY - MAGIK EXHIBIT HALL - NIGHT ABE'S VOICE hound of resurrection -- HELLBOY See? I don't like that -- ABE'S VOICE -- Hound of resurrection? Hellboy looks back at the corpse: it's gone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: BAMMM!! From out of nowhere, Sammael appears and swings an arm!! Hellboy CRASHES into the brass doors!
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: harbinger of pestilence, seed of destruction -- HELLBOY Skip to the end, willya?  How do I kill it -- ?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It doesn't say --
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The doors bulge and crack under Hellboy's impact. Abe and Broom backpedal fast. Myers pulls out his gun, and starts looking for another way in. Broom observes this, pleased.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sammael lashes out with a massive punch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: goes K-KKRASH!!! K-KKRASH!!! through SIX glass cabinets, then hits a window, falling -- EXT. AN ALLEY - BEHIND MACHEN LIBRARY - NIGHT -- two stories down, landing sideways in an industrial garbage bin. Hellboy fights to stay conscious. Blood drips from his mouth
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy looks up: standing in the alley, like an apparition, is Grigory, in a black suit and overcoat, his eyes shielded by pitch-black sunglasses
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy's in shock, confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy catches sight of his big gun, lying on the ground. He goes for it but, BAMMM!!!! SAMMAEL lands before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Before Hellboy can reach the weapon -- WSHHHP!!! A 7-foot tongue lashes out from Sammael's mouth like a whip. It's arm-thick, with yellow sacs billowing from its sides. It wraps around Hellboy's right arm. Hellboy falls to the ground, writhing, grinding his teeth. The tongue squeezes and pulls. Smoke pours from Hellboy's skin.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Child...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: All grown up, I see.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That voice -- GRIGORY I sang the first lullaby you ever heard, my child. I ushered you into this world. (beat) I alone know your true calling, your true name.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't tell me, it's Zeppo.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I can see that you're still young and don't know your place. (turns to Sammael) Teach him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Then -- BANG! BANG! BANG! Myers appears at the end of the alley, firing round after round into Sammael's tongue. AMBER BLOOD explodes in the air. The tongue recoils with an infernal SQUEAL!! Hellboy manages to roll away. Myers goes for HELLBOY's gun... and grabs it! He takes cover behind the trash container. HELLBOY is there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers proudly shows him the gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He grabs his gun and tries to reload, but his arm hurts too much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He hands him the gun and a fresh clip. Reaching into his belt, Hellboy extracts a vacuum-sealed packet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the packet: A SINGLE BULLET.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What do you think you're doing??
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Helping you -- I just -- HELLBOY No one ever helps me. It's my job.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Damn -- Okay. Here --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (throws it at Myers)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Then load this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's a tracking bullet. Crack the pin. Load it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: !!! The tongue punches through the steel like a ramrod. Again and again... Hellboy and Myers can barely dodge it. Myers cracks a safety pin. The glass head on the bullet glows like a chemical flare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's looking at Hellboy's smoking arm. Inside a bloody gash, a big, black stinger is gleaming. Hellboy pulls it out, then steps on it. It pops like a ripe grape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy steps from behind the container. Sammael's tongue instantly wraps around the gun's muzzle.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Jeez... What the hell is that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Lemme go ask --
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ! BAM! Hellboy shoots repeatedly. His face lit weirdly green as the tracking bullet lodges within the gun. Then -- BAM!!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The glowing bullet flies through the barrel and out towards -- EXT. ALLEY -- Sammael, still in mid-air. It hits him square in the chest: an explosion of green goo!! With a shriek, the thing leaps over a wall. Hellboy scrambles after it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the empty sidewalk, Hellboy sees a trail of GLOWING GOOP. He hits full stride, following it around a corner. Myers lands a second later, cradling his arm, chasing after him.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Wait! No, what are you doing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Sammael dashes by, followed closely by Hellboy, running full tilt. A ten-wheeler backs up, effectively blocking their way. A few workers load pumpkin boxes in it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Without slowing down, Sammael jumps onto the trailer, denting the roof then jumping off and into a CROWDED CARNIVAL area. A small carrousel and refreshment stand flank a pumpkin patch. Full of curiosity, Sammael pauses a second to inspect a Trick- or-treater dressed as a GOLDEN DRAGON. Hellboy catapults himself onto the trailer's roof.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy jumps and lands heavily on top of the driver's cab: CRASH!!! The driver is almost crushed under the steel. He screams, showered by thousands of glass shards. Myers is a few steps behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He squeezes between the vehicle and the alley wall. The vendors are yelling at him.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What the hell is that??
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (chorus) Whoa-whoa-whoa-
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (into headset) We'll hit the street in a minute. We're heading towards civilians...

direction.raw_text: Sammael runs past a group of trick-or-treaters, and jumps straight into the street. Cars swerve, avoiding a collision as Sammael lands on the opposite sidewalk. Seeing this, Hellboy runs back, and lands next to Myers, holds out his STONE HAND and stops the 4x4 dead in its tracks. The impact somersaults the car over them both. It lands with a thud on the street, air bags exploding. Myers almost faints. Other cars stop, tires squealing and horns blaring. A major traffic jam.

He follows it, until it ends abruptly. He looks ahead: no trace of Sammael... Then a fat drop of glowing goop hits his hand.

direction.raw_text: He looks up. Sammael hangs from the ceiling, then drops. Then the creature lifts Hellboy in a ferocious bear hug. Hellboy twists around and cracks open the jaws of the creature, like King Kong and the T-Rex. Sammael staggers back and -- in an impossible maneuver, re- knits his jaws together! Then he uses his bone scythe to tackle Hellboy and -- TCHAKKKK!! -- pin his shoulder down. A deep wound. Sammael's mouth starts to open! Hellboy looks at the sparking THIRD RAIL a few feet away. Sammael's tongue rears back, a snake ready to strike.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy grabs the rail. An electrical discharge consumes both creatures and burns the frame like flashpaper. Hellboy lets go, his hand and body smoking. Sammael -- very crispy -- is convulsing in a cloud of smoke. He grows still. Wreathed in smoke, Hellboy shakes off the shock and uses a flame on his arm to light a cigar.

dialogue.raw_text: Aw, I forgot --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Screw you.

dialogue.raw_text: I'm fireproof. (puffs smoke, kicks the body) You weren't.

direction.raw_text: Hours earlier: the place is intact. Both ABE and BROOM witness spectrally as -- A GUARD CHECKS AN ALARM MONITORING UNIT. HEARING A ticking sound, he shines his light into a dark corner: no one's there. But after the guard moves on, a spidery form emerges from the pool of shadows on the floor. It's KROENEN, encased in shiny BLACK LATEX from head to toe. On his chest, a close-fitting harness comprised of softly ticking gears. He approaches a glass case which holds an ancient WOODEN STATUE of an Eastern Orthodox SAINT. Then, on the glass, a reflection: ILSA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She uses her hammer to destroy the glass case. The ALARM shrieks. Warning lights come on. Kroenen pulls out a double-ended BLADE. It spins, like a giant bone saw, slicing across the statue. No apparent damage until: CRACKKKKK!!! a diagonal line appears and the top half falls.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Move.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: reaches for a small crank embedded in his chest and winds himself up. Ilsa reaches into a hollow portion in the wooden statue and removes a large reliquary jar containing Golden sand. Six guards hurry in. They point their flashlights and guns at Kroenen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kroenen starts shaking, as if in a seizure and readies two TWIN BLADES. bullet tears into Kroenen's arm, spewing forth an explosion of dust. He turns. The guards shoot again. Kroenen maneuvers the steel, deflecting the bullets which -- -- ricochet wildly -- and finally hit three of the guards. They fall silently to the floor. Kroenen dispatches two more in a flurry of knives. The last guard raises his gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something is clearly stopping him. His hand breaks, twisted by an unseen force!! The flesh on his neck pushes upwards, held by an invisible force. He starts floating in mid-air. The blinking lights of arriving police cars tint the windows red and amber. They outline a figure formerly submerged in shadows. GRIGORY. He gestures with both hands, as if holding an imaginary doll. His arm muscles twitch under his skin, shifting, changing, gaining strength. With a quick gesture Grigory twists the lower and upper parts of the guard's body in opposite directions. With a wet CRUNCH, the guard's shadow on the wall goes limp. Grigory looks at Ilsa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ilsa opens the reliquary jar and pours a circle of sand onto the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grigory slices the air with his open hand, creating fleeting glyphs... and a small BLACK flame dances on his open palm. He deposits it in mid-air, at the center of the circle. Then, the sand begins to move, like liquid mercury. Lines fuse into a pile. It melts and bubbles, growing and foaming. Bones are formed, tendons and ligaments join together, GROWING, GROWING, INTO SAMMAEL. It roars!!!
direction.name: direction

Near a window, a Down's Syndrome PATIENT senses something.

direction.raw_text: They start throwing stones. One hits the steps. Another misses her by inches. A third hits her in the shoulder. Scared, Liz turns but a rock catches her full on the face. She falls down, blood trickling from her forehead, splattering the pavement. She starts sobbing. Another rock sails across, but this time, in mid-air, it catches fire and turns to ash. A ripple of heat starts crawling up Liz's hands. Soon a pale blue flame rings her entire arm.

direction.raw_text: Firelight glints off the crucifix.

direction.raw_text: is dunking the apples in a pot of caramel. A heartbreaking cry reaches her ears.

direction.raw_text: She then explodes. A white-hot supernova engulfs the courtyard. Her mother's body burns like flash paper. Then the rest of the people are -- THE ENTIRE TENEMENT COURTYARD -- devoured by an explosion of atomic proportions. Benches, people, trees. Everything. The four surrounding apartment blocks collapse as a shock wave hits like a wrecking ball. The frame whites out. And at ground zero there is but one figure left standing: Liz... a little girl, still crying.

dialogue.raw_text: Help meee!!!

direction.raw_text: In their glass kiosk, two ORDERLIES are listening to the radio and sharing a pizza. A red light flashes repeatedly on a panel. They silence the radio, grab their batons and get up. A low rumble shakes the room. Through the VIBRATING glass window they see...

direction.raw_text: ...A BALL OF FLAME pushing inexorably through the corridor. The inside of the glass booth is absolutely silent, making the vision both terrifying and strangely serene.

dialogue.raw_text: Oh my --

dialogue.raw_text: Dr. Broom asked me to invite you back to the Bureau. No special precautions, no security escorts. You and me in a taxi. Like regular folks.

direction.raw_text: . BEAM TUNNEL AREA - BENJAMIN INSTITUTE - DAY An explosion of sound and light as a subway train passes through a dank tunnel. Then, light beams sweep the encrusted walls and steel columns. Clay and some B.P.R.D. agents hold flashlights. Two of them -- MOSS and QUARRY -- carry FLAMETHROWERS. Hellboy and Abe bring up the rear.

direction.raw_text: They enter a store room piled high with filing cabinets, typewriters and school desks. A turn-of-the-century mural depicts happy boys doing charitable acts. A Latin phrase ("VIRILITER AGE") encourages them to behave like men.

dialogue.raw_text: (reads a map) We're in the cellar of the Benjamin Institute. Turn-of-the-century orphanage. Closed since they moved the sewers in '51.

dialogue.raw_text: there --

direction.raw_text: . (SET/LOCATION BUILT SUGAR FACTORY) FURNACE ROOM - DAY Makeshift living quarters tucked below a maze of furnace ducts. Scores of old clocks fill the room with TICKING. At a desk, Kroenen calmly repairs a mechanical hand: his own. His face is partly exposed. Under his leather mask, horrible lidless eyes glitter over a skull-like grin, made of raw gums and taut skin. As Hellboy's pounding reaches his ears, he rises, like a spider whose web has twitched. The mechanical hand rattles blindly on the table. He opens an ancient leather folder and extracts an engraving depicting Sammael. Carefully places it on the table. Then he opens a drawer and, from an envelope, takes two torn pieces of paper. He puts them in a pouch in his belt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The wall collapses under Hellboy's attack.

direction.raw_text: Clay smiles uncertainly back. Hellboy moves in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: INT. ABANDONED SHOWER ROOM (SET) - DAY A large oval room of rusting metal, with pipes spilling water through a large GRATE on the floor. Abe studies it, senses something, and nods. With superhuman effort, Hellboy lifts it. Hundreds of roaches pour out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Below, a vast cistern. Abe drops in two CHEMICAL FLARES.

dialogue.raw_text: Are you coming or not?

direction.raw_text: . ABANDONED SHOWER ROOM (SET) - DAY Abe pulls off his breathing apparatus. Activates the locator on his utility belt. Hellboy does likewise. BEEEP! The devices synchronize. Hellboy extends a metal reliquary containing a small bone.

In the albums, a myriad of sad faces, the orphans from the past. Some of the faces have been cut out. There's an unfinished letter to Father Christmas, dated 1866. Clay stands below a grate, admiring his hair implants with a hand mirror.

direction.raw_text: . UNDERWATER CHAMBER 2 (LOCATION R. WAREHOUSE) - DAY Abe nears the bottom of the cistern. As his feet touch bottom, a cloud of silt fogs the water. He picks out a translucent egg! Suddenly, something big glides by. Abe turns: sees nothing. He places the egg in a glass canister. Now eggs are floating everywhere, undulating in the water like amber fireflies. Abe swims slowly, collecting them one by one. Some of them are snugly wedged between two rusty machines. Abe's reliquary gets caught in a lever and snaps loose!! It lands -- on a grate on the floor. Abe swims down and tries to grab it, but it falls through. Abe curses and stands up -- -- only to find himself FACE TO FACE with Sammael!! The monster rakes Abe across the chest; dark blue blood begins to flow. Abe shoves himself into a long, concrete fissure. Sammael can't fit through, but the tongue darts out, missing Abe by inches. Sammael scratches at the walls, trying to reach deeper, screaming in rage. Abe screams too, emitting a trail of bubbles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bubbles burst on the surface. Watching them is a SECOND SAMMAEL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy stops, disoriented. No trace of KROENEN. He sniffs the air, then steps through a non-descript portal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . (LOCATION/BUILT SUGAR FACTORY) FURNACE ROOM - DAY Hellboy stands in Kroenen's quarters. An array of gas masks dangle from ducts overhead. Glued next to the walls are dozens of old photos of children. He discovers the Sammael engraving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly: drool drops from above: Sammael hangs from a beam.

direction.raw_text: Sammael lunges, hurling Hellboy through an open service shaft... ...and it's a long way down. When Sammael leaps, Hellboy throws him over the edge. Sammael, however, grabs Hellboy's tail and pulls him over the side.

dialogue.raw_text: "Sammael: seed of destruction. Death becomes the fertile ground."

dialogue.raw_text: (turning) Didn't I kill you already?

direction.raw_text: . SERVICE SHAFT (NEW LOCATION SET) - DAY They crash through pipes, wiring and ducts and slide off down a duct and into -- INT. SERVICE SHAFT 2 (SET) - SAME another passage. There they bounce off of dripping water pipes and jutting steel I beams, until they finally break through a mesh/insulation ceiling and directly onto -- INT. SUBWAY PLATFORM STATION - DAY A subway platform. Full of people. The two fighting creatures land on the ticket booth -- in an explosion of coins, glass and steel!!! Some bold New Yorker in the crowd start picking up handfuls of change. The dust clears, revealing a large crater in the platform floor. Sammael hits Hellboy. The Red Giant lands on a line of turnstiles, uprooting them all. Sammael flies through the air, unfolds its bone scythe. Hellboy rolls away. Sammael misses: the tip imbeds itself in the floor and then -- TCHAKKK!!! -- in a concrete column. Sammael pulls, bringing down part of the ceiling. More SCREAMS from the fleeing public. A mezzanine above Hellboy collapses, bringing the ceiling, steel cables and office furniture down onto the Red Giant. Sammael takes a step towards the crowd and roars -- Then, BAMMMMMM!!! A desk flies up into the air. Hellboy's stone hand emerges, triumphant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He climbs out of the crater. Sammael growls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy rips off one of the turnstile bars and hits Sammael again and again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sammael blocks the last hit and throws the bar away. It embeds itself in the tile wall. Sammael punches Hellboy, a hard uppercut. Hellboy flies up, crashing through the plate glass of a second mezzanine above the platform. He skids on the tile floor, scraping a jagged line with his stone hand. He slides past a group of BYSTANDERS and into a row of backlit subway ads. He lands in a shower of glass and debris on a wooden bench, breaking it in two. Sammael climbs up into the mezzanine. Hellboy gets up -- his back bristling with glass shards -- and hears a WAIL: a YOUNG GIRL is pointing at A BOX OF KITTENS abandoned on a bench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sammael charges!!! Hellboy scoops up the box, holds it high!! Using his bone blade, Sammael pulverizes the bench. Next, Sammael slashes at Hellboy, scattering a dozen shrieking citizens. Illuminated by sparks and shorting lamps, Hellboy advances, blood dripping from his forehead and nose. Hellboy starts to reload, but -- Sammael's tongue shoots out. Hellboy throws the kitten box in the air and -- traps the tongue with his stone hand -- HELLBOY Second date. No tongue!!
direction.name: direction

Sammael pulls harder, enters the tunnel. Hellboy fights to free himself, but his sweaty face is millimeters away from being sliced by the glass. All seems lost, when...

Moss hurriedly straps on his flame thrower. After a few seconds, a green light beeps, READY. The muzzle of the flamethrower vomits a 30 feet long gout of fire into the blackness. The men pause: silence! Quarry turns on his flashlight, hand trembling.

direction.raw_text: stand in the tunnel. One of them gleefully squeezes Quarry. The man's screams are muffled by the creature's fleshy lips wrapping around his head. Moss runs as fast as he can, jumping and tumbling through an obstacle course of beams. Turning, he readies the flamethrower. The SECOND SAMMAEL lands on Moss's back, breaking his spine.

He fires. Kroenen stabs. Twin rivulets of blood run from Clay's nostrils. INT. TUNNEL LABYRINTH - CONNECTING SHOWER ROOM (SET) - DAY Hellboy hears the gunfire, starts running.

direction.raw_text: Clay falls to the floor. Kroenen stands there, unfazed by Clay's bullets in his chest. Dust pours from his wounds and piles up neatly at his feet. He hears Hellboy coming.He places the knife on the floor, then lies down and plays dead. Hellboy appears at the end of the tunnel. He glances at Kroenen's body, then quickly checks for a pulse on Clay. Hellboy looks demolished.

direction.raw_text: . BPRD ADJACENT AVENUE - DAY An ethnic pop song blasts from the taxi radio. Liz pokes her head out of the window and shoots a Polaroid snapshot. She passes it to Myers:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He can't hear her over the music. Myers knocks on the bulletproof acrylic divider.

direction.raw_text: He merely changes the radio station; the music stays at the same volume. Myers looks back at Liz. She is halfway out the window, sitting on the door.

direction.raw_text: She takes another Polaroid and passes it down to him. Myers looks at the Polaroid, then smiles. He climbs out of the other window, hands her the photograph.

direction.raw_text: He waves at her. For the first time, she smiles.

direction.raw_text: She takes his picture. With the cold morning wind blowing Liz's hair and the sun on her face, she looks beautiful.

direction.raw_text: .P.R.D. - MAIN HALL AREA - DAY A new space. Office corridors radiate out from a brass B.P.R.D. logo on the floor. A few agents monitor computer stations and tactical glass boards. Liz and Myers walk in, carrying her suitcases. She looks around and sees BROOM coming down the hall.

dialogue.raw_text: Welcome back.

dialogue.raw_text: (seeing her) Liz? Liz!!

direction.raw_text: He sits by her side on the bed.

direction.raw_text: A cat bats at a ball of paper. On it, two words are visible: DEAR LIZ. Hellboy's tail scoops up the paper and throws it in a brimming wastebasket. He's sitting at a stainless steel desk, deep in concentration, writing with evident difficulty. The floor around him is covered with more crumpled pages. In the background, the projector is showing DUCK SOUP. Myers pushes in a cartload of CHILI.

direction.raw_text: Myers sets the tray on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As he goes out, Liz appears in the doorway. Hellboy quickly stops writing.

direction.raw_text: Hellboy stands up, walks towards her.

direction.raw_text: Myers walks back in pushing a tray of nachos.

dialogue.raw_text: Where do you -- HELLBOY Shh! Just a second.

dialogue.raw_text: Nah, sounds too "needy."

dialogue.raw_text: Start in, you got nachos coming.

dialogue.raw_text: For a cup of coffee, but go ahead, read.

dialogue.raw_text: (to Hellboy) Hey, your chili's getting cold -- HELLBOY (sits back down) Not hungry.

dialogue.raw_text: What did you want me to hear -- ?

dialogue.raw_text: Anything else you -- HELLBOY (snappy) Not from you.

dialogue.raw_text: Well good n-

dialogue.raw_text: (furious) Good night.

dialogue.raw_text: The subject: Karl Ruprecht Kroenen --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Suffered a masochistic compulsion known as surgical addiction.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Both eyelids were surgically removed along with his upper and lower lips, making speech impossible. The blood in his veins dried up decades ago. Only dust remains. (looks at an X-ray film) Four pulverized vertebrae. A steel rod inserted into his pelvis held him up. (beat) What horrible will power could keep a thing like this alive?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: .P.R.D. HALLWAYS - NIGHT Under the gaze of high-security cameras, AGENT LIME rolls Hellboy's food cart down the corridor and into the domed intersection. He whistles a happy tune. Opens the high security door.

dialogue.raw_text: Jesus.

direction.raw_text: What are you two talking about. What's so fascinating?? So important?? EXT. NEWARK N.J. STREETS - NIGHT Liz and Myers pause at a corner, waiting for the light. The shops are closing.

direction.raw_text: Liz half-smiles, sips her coffee.

direction.raw_text: As they walk down the street. A red streak jumps over roof tops.

dialogue.raw_text: Strong.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: A brute.

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I know.

dialogue.raw_text: Don't know. Really. I grew up with him. (beat) I've missed him too, but now, every time I see him, I get confused. Hardly a day goes by he's not in my mind. Even now, I feel he's here --
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hellboy lands neatly on the adjacent roof. He looks down at Myers and Liz -- Myers offers her cream and sugar.

direction.raw_text: She takes the coffee, waves off the half and half.

dialogue.raw_text: No cream and sugar, moron. She takes it black.

dialogue.raw_text: Toldya.

direction.raw_text: .J. STREETS - NIGHT MYERS It's freezing, isn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By now, all the shops are closed. They approach a small park near a train track.

direction.raw_text: She cleans off a wet, dirty bench, sits down.

direction.raw_text: Myers is falling for her.

dialogue.raw_text: Coffee's warming me up.

He flexes the shiny fingers. Kroenen's hideous cranium is visible for an instant before he zips up his mask. He takes the sharp Ragnarok knives and turns one over. It reflects a figure standing behind him: Grigory.

Monstrous shapes lumber in the distance... an army of apocalyptic beasts outlined against the blood-red sky. Dominating the horror is a mountain of festering skeletons and skulls. At the top, a figure: HELLBOY, transformed. His horns are in full bloom, his eyes and mouth stream unearthly fire.

The hearse doors close and the vehicle pulls away. Watching like a gargoyle from a distant roof: Hellboy. Rain bounces off his wet overcoat. Liz observes him, worried.

dialogue.raw_text: Hi.

He makes you feel like you belong. And -- that's good. It really is. I -- wish I could do something about this -- (points at his own face) But I can't. (beat) I can promise you only two things... One: I'll always look this good. Two: I won't give up on you. Ever.

dialogue.raw_text: June 30th, 1908. It burned hundreds of square miles of forest. The Romanovs took possession of it immediately. The Czar guarded it jealously -- I have wanted it for ages.

dialogue.raw_text: Now, finally, it's mine.
