direction.raw_text: He gestures and all the agents head for the vans.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Forget it. This is practically a city. And it stinks, and it's muddy. We'll go back, check into a hotel, regroup after breakfast. We'll have to make a grid, go by quadrants. Maybe satellite photography.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let me ask for directions.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The group surrounds a grave. Hellboy raises the broken stone cover and then jumps in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and lands on a rotten coffin. In it, a mummified corpse lies in a miserable black suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He presses the amulet on the cadaver's forehead. For a moment, nothing, and then... ...a brutal spasm!! The corpse gasps, breathes... and mutters something in tongueless Russian. SUBTITLE: WHAT DO YOU WANT?
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (whispers) Animam edere, animus corpus...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The group gawks as Hellboy climbs out, carrying the CORPSE on his back. With an ear-to-ear grin, he approaches the team.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The corpse fidgets on Hellboy's back. Its bony hand weakly points, as if in confirmation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The corpse mutters again. SUBTITLED: GO THAT WAY, RED MONKEY.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Sixty feet further, comrades, and three rows in...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This here is Ivan Klimentovich: Say "hi" Ivan.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A miniature black marble castle. Using a crowbar, Myers pries open the ancient steel door. Hellboy, still carrying the desiccated abomination on his back, walks in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . YEFIMOVICH MAUSOLEUM STAIRS - LATER - DAY Two agents stand guard in the mausoleum, while the group descends carefully. The walls are dotted with yellowed skulls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers' flashlight flickers. He shakes it back to life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They reach the bottom of the staircase: three corridors branch off in different directions. Hellboy deposits the CORPSE attop a pile of coffins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: INT. UNDERGROUND CORRIDOR AND INTERSECTION - DAY TCHKANGGG!!!!! large spiked metal plates shoot up from below, blocking both their way out, demolishing the staircase and ramming Stone: he's gone. Wicked spikes cover the metal surface. Hellboy still bangs on it, but to no avail: it's at least six inches thick. Liz and Myers are on the other side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the other side of the panel, Myers takes the radio from Liz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liz and Myers move off. Hellboy shines his light down the tunnel on the left. Agent Lime picks up the corpse and follows.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We'll be alright... as long as we don't separate --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (into his walkie-talkie) Okay, someone's expecting us. Turn on your locators -- Anyone sees anything...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Marco...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ...Polo.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (into radio) Are you sure about this?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: On a scale of one to ten: two. But -- (beat)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: she'll take care of you, Myers. She's a tough one.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hellboy and Manning come into a vast chamber: Slavic motifs crown the rugged stone pillars and archways. Water runs down the walls. Across a small stone bridge, light pours from a hexagonal structure. They step onto the bridge. KLANGGG!!! two gears release a steel door from above, forcing them to forge ahead. Somewhere, a  massive clockwork is TICKING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy motions for silence. The CORPSE mutters: "IT'S SOMETHING BIG" They stare into the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy yanks Manning just in time. BAMMM!!!! A gigantic metal pendulum swings past and demolishes one third of the bridge a few feet from their feet. It takes Lime and the CORPSE with it. Another door on the far end of the bridge shudders downward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoosh! The PENDULUM swings back. It destroys more of the bridge. Manning sprints for all he's worth and crawls under the door. Hellboy runs, but chunks of stone disintegrate under his feet. The pendulum swings back taking out the final piece of the bridge just as Hellboy rolls under the door -- -- and makes it into the hexagonal building.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What's that --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We should go back -- you -- you could tear that door apart -- HELLBOY Don't move. We -- MANNING -- should go back. Now!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No. Don't -- MANNING I'm in charge. We go back!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Son of a --
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hellboy and Manning find themselves in a very narrow, arched stone corridor. Its walls are lined with endless rows of rusty steel blades. Faint traces of WAGNER can be heard. They cautiously proceed...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There. In yellow gaslight, Kroenen nods attentively as a phonograph plays the love duet from TRISTAN UND ISOLDE. Above him, ropes, hooks and pulleys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Manning rest his hand too close to a blade.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Ouch!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Kroenen comes alert. He scans the room, quietly winds himself up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy shoots a dirty look at Manning and then looks back into the chamber -- -- Kroenen is gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy readies his gun and then creeps toward the lab.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (to Manning) Crap. This guy moves like a cockroach --
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hellboy's footsteps elicit soft creaks from the wooden floor. Manning moves along behind him. The record finishes playing. Silence -- SWISH!!! Kroenen's whirling blades slice the air, ripping into Manning's arm. As Kroenen goes in for the kill -- -- Hellboy thrusts out his stone fist as a shield. Kroenen bears down but Hellboy fends him off with powerful, deliberate blocks. Kroenen hauls out one of his long swords.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy yanks it away and bends it like a twig. BAMMMM!!!! He punches Kroenen in the face, crumpling the steel mask, smashing its lenses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: BAMMM!!!! another hit. Kroenen staggers back with each blow. Finally, the mask falls off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An asthmatic wheeze erupts from his scarred face. Kroenen is laughing.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Screw that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You killed my father --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Give your soul to God, Your ass is mine.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: !!! Under his feet, a huge trapdoor falls open. He and Manning drop through, along with the phonograph. Hellboy grabs a rope. It spins through a copper pulley, but a large knot jerks him to a stop. Hellboy snatches Manning's hand, but loses his backpack. He looks down. The phonograph hits the ground with a crash.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (panting, whispers) Well, it's not that big a fall...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: !!!!! The entire bottom bristles with six-foot, sparkling steel blades.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kroenen cautiously leans over the pit. He can't hear a sound. As he peeks -- SWISH!! A loop of the rope wraps around his neck and yanks him forward! Before he goes over, he frantically digs his blades into the floor, anchoring himself.
direction.name: direction

location: ABOVE THE HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT
result.heading: INT.

direction.raw_text: Hellboy has used the rope hanging below him as a lasso. MANNING clings to his powerful back as he climbs up, hand over hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kroenen goes to cut the rope...
direction.name: direction

location: ABOVE THE HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT
result.heading: INT.

direction.raw_text: (reaching the top) Oh, no you don't -- Hellboy wraps the rope around his stone fist and, with a brutal stone-fist yank, pulls KROENEN into the pit! With a horrible scream, Kroenen drops headfirst past them and onto the spikes. He wriggles like a fish caught on a hook, only making it worse, as he slides further down the blades.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy climbs out and sits. Sees Kroenen's blade embedded in the floor. Holding it: the prosthetic hand, still ticking.
direction.name: direction

location: ABOVE THE HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT
result.heading: INT.

direction.raw_text: Hellboy peers down. Still alive, Kroenen frees one arm, slicing through his own ropy bicep.
direction.name: direction

location: ABOVE THE HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT
result.heading: INT.

dialogue.raw_text: You like playing possum, you Nazi pinhead? (beat) Then try playing dead.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hellboy tips a massive cogwheel over the edge. Kroenen emits a horrid scream as it crushes him.
direction.name: direction

location: BOTTOM OF HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT
result.heading: INT.

direction.raw_text: Manning sits down, bandaging his injuries. Hellboy kneels down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Manning nods weakly. Hellboy brings out a cigar and fires up his Zippo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He digs out one of his fine cigars, cuts it and hands it to HELLBOY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He lights it for him. Hellboy grins.
direction.name: direction

location: ABOVE THE HEXAGONAL TRAP DOOR PIT
result.heading: INT.

dialogue.raw_text: Are you okay?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You'd better stay here. I'll find a way out. We'll come back for you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You call that thing a cigar??
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yup.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You never, ever light a cigar that way.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Use a wooden match. It preserves the flavor.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thank you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (smiles) My job.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . TUNNEL "B" - UNDERGROUND NARROW TUNNEL - DAY A narrow tunnel. Liz and Myers advance carefully. Just ahead, a cave-in. Pieces of ceiling, timber, coffins and corpses form a chaotic barrier. As they squeeze past...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A few bones roll by. Wet earth drops onto their shoulders. They draw their arms close to their bodies, pointing their flashlight beams straight down. A moment of strange intimacy.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: So, he thinks that you and I... That's why he's mad at me --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But it's not true, is it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What -- ?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That you feel that way about me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You want to know -- Now -- ? Here? Red, white, whatever -- Guys are all the same.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hellboy labors up a steep slope, using rocks and roots for handholds. He reaches a dead end and collapses, out of breath. Light filters through a crack in the ground; he can faintly hear Liz and Myers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liz and Myers reach a wider section of Tunnel "B". They find themselves calf-deep in brown water. Myers lights Liz's path as she steps onto a large stone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His light shorts out. She shines her light past him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers turns. His flashlight comes back on, revealing a complex natural cavern. An entire WALL IS COVERED with translucent eggs.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Watch out. It's slippery...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, my God...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: is there, gnawing on a dry arm bone, with the hand still attached. When the light hits his face, his milky pupils constrict. A snarl...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: emerges from the water. It shakes itself off. A THIRD ONE raise its head. Myers and Liz try to back away, but a metal wall rises right behind them KLANKKKKK!!! They are trapped!! Myers goes to grab a set of explosive belts. Tries to set up the timer. Zipp! -- one Sammael snatches them away. Myers falls to the ground, clothes torn, injured.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something stomps on the ceiling directly above them. Again and again.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (into the radio) Marco, Marco, Marco... Get your Big Red butt over here!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hellboy pounds the floor with his rock hand. Furiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The rocks below him start to crumble.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Hang on kid, I'm coming for you!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: In an "ANT FARM" view of the complex, we see Hellboy above, pummeling and -- in the cavern below -- Liz and Myers.
direction.name: direction

location: ANTHILL VIEW OF UNDERGROUND TUNNELS AND PITS
result.heading: EXT.

direction.raw_text: Dust and rocks fall from above. The four identical creatures move in on Liz and Myers. Myers shoots one in the head three times. The creature shakes off the hits as if pelted with pebbles. One of them springs. As it flies through the air, Hellboy crashes through the ceiling. He lands on top of it along with a ton or two of stone. The creature is crushed. Two eggs glow, metamorphosing. Presto -- two new Sammaels are born. The first two Sammaels growl, joined by the two new ones. Liz sprints to safety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy scoops up Myers and deposits him next to Liz. Lit by Myers' flashlight, two of the creatures jump. One clamps onto Hellboy's back, the other onto his leg. Hellboy howls. The third one joins in, like lions dragging down a zebra. This time, though, the zebra fights back. Hellboy pulls out his gun and fires a round into the chest of a Sammael. Two eggs glow -- two new Sammaels are born. They're FIVE. Hellboy's torso is covered in blood. He falls to the ground. A fourth and a fifth creature spring onto him, biting. Hellboy is in trouble. Liz watches and shivers. A ripple of heat shimmers over her body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liz is desperate, crying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy screams. Water explodes under the fighting bodies. Two of the Sammaels turn their attention to Liz and Myers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liz slaps him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A beat of silence, then Myers slaps her across the face, once. Hard. The heat ripple builds. The air vibrates around her. Her pupils kick back light, like an animal's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers ducks behind a rock as Liz's arms blaze with fire. The two approaching Sammaels are ready to pounce. On top of Hellboy, one of them turns its head, like a lion hearing the hunter's gunshots. A staggering Hellboy sees Liz's body shake in a surge of white-hot energy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The water at her feet blows away as a concave shockwave of fire expands. The fire engulfs the creatures. Devours them all.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Sorry. Just couldn't leave you two alone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (at Myers) Hit me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hit me -- (beat) All of my life I've run away from it... Now I want it to happen! Do it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I can't, I --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I know now: I love him. I've always loved him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Go now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (weak) Liz...
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: -- FADE OUT / FADE IN OMIT INT

direction.raw_text: The screen FADES TO WHITE and then... Silence, then a pulse. A high ringing tone. A heartbeat. Hellboy pushes away the half-cooked remains of two Sammaels. The other creatures are little more than blackened bones. He stumbles forward. No water left. Everything is half-buried in a cracked, bone-dry bed of mud. Liz lies on the ground, on her side, unconscious. Myers is alive, but too groggy to even acknowledge it. Weakly, Hellboy turns around: In the eerie silence of his deafness, he sees Grigory -- LAUGHING noiselessly, witness to an absurd comedy. Ilsa approaches. And -- in a simple, brutal move -- hits him with a hammer -- FADE OUT / FADE IN OMIT INT. THE CATACOMBS - NIGHT Hellboy slowly comes to. He is chained to a massive wooden yoke. He takes notice of his surroundings: a large church- like space, surrounded by funeral niches and statues holding swords. High columns flank huge mechanical gears. An SOLAR SYSTEM MODEL takes the place of an altar. Off to one side, Ilsa uses a hammer to destroy the timers on the explosive belts. Next to the main nave, Myers is tied to a stone pillar. Under his feet, a blood channel, leading to the immense stone slab bought from Lapikov. Liz lies at Grigory's feet. He's dressed in a ceremonial robe and holds his leather book open. His back to Hellboy, he faces a mural of the angel Abbadon holding a key.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy tenses, rage building. The yoke creaks, but doesn't bend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy studies the stone sculpture, its three HAND IMPRINTS -- ILSA (triumphant) What did you think it was made for? Open the locks. Hellboy stares at his huge right arm, as if for the first time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ilsa kicks Myers in the face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The open dome above reveals the moon. An eclipse is beginning. The altar's clockworks monitors its progress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grigory turns to Hellboy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In torment, Hellboy, shakes his head: no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He leans over Liz, whispers in her ear: Her body arches, her mouth emits a plume of energy. Grigory greedily inhales it. Then she goes limp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He struggles again. One of the cuffs snaps. He swats Ilsa with his free hand. She stumbles backwards. Now Hellboy fights to free his other hand. Indifferent, Grigory watches the eclipse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His head and heart racing, Hellboy struggles for an answer. Can't find one... the moon is almost totally eclipsed. He drops his gaze. His voice a hoarse whisper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grigory moves close to Hellboy. Rips the rosary off his wrist. It lands near Myers.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: "And I looked and beheld an Angel, and in his hand the key to the bottomless pit..."
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (gestures at the stone piece) These were the words I heard as a peasant boy in Tobolsk. And now, the door -- Sent by the Ogdruh Jahad so that they might at long last enter our world.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Hellboy) You are the key! The right hand of doom!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't do it!! Don't do it!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Silence!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Imagine it: An eden for you and her -- HELLBOY No.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No? (reasonable) In exchange for her life then, open the door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: As you wish.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: She's dead.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Noooo! Noooo!!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Her soul awaits on the other side. If you want her back... (beat) Open the door and claim her.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: For her.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Names hold the power and nature of things. Mine for example. Rasputin: "The crossroads." (beat) And crossroads I have become. (beat) Your true name: Anung-un-Rama. Repeat it. Become the key.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (closing his eyes) Anung-un-Rama...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hellboy's stone arm glows. Ancient symbols of fire burn the stone. Flames momentarily engulf his body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy roars as his HORNS majestically burst forth! Out of his mouth, energy and light boil like condensing breath on a winter's night. Inebriated with power, the new PRINCE OF HELL smiles with supreme arrogance. His shadow falls on the white marble of the slab and mysteriously spreads over it until the stone turns black as obsidian.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: No!! Don't do it!! Listen to me!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: inserts his enormous paw into the FIRST IMPRINT on the stone slab -- CLACK!! He turns it, like a lock. A beam of crimson light shoot upwards into the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Visible from all over Moscow, the beam blazes to the moon! The same phenomenon as in the prologue, but this time it's more intense, with ripples and haloes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Again, the infinite, starry space. Again, the OGDRU JAHAD. The ruby beam pierces the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy watches as the FIRST IMPRINT disappears. In its place: a burning glyph. Myers struggles with his bindings. The rough hemp cuts his skin, but he manages to free one hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: shifts, suddenly breaking free. Gelatinous limbs uncurl, expand. Its enormity puzzles the eye, obscuring the frame.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: NIGHT IN THE STORM CLOUDS, LIGHTNING ILLUMINATES GARGANTUAN TENTACLES REACHING INTO THE EARTHLY PLANE

direction.raw_text: Hellboy thrusts his hand into the SECOND IMPRINT. CLACK! He turns it. Myers spots the broken rosary and reaches for it -- INT. THE SKY - NIGHT IN THE STORM CLOUDS, LIGHTNING ILLUMINATES GARGANTUAN TENTACLES REACHING INTO THE EARTHLY PLANE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grigory drinks in the first signs of the arrival and laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy puts his hand inside, CLACK!!! Before he can turn it, Myers reaches the rosary. Ilsa lunges at him. He clobbers her full in the face. She staggers back and down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He throws the rosary at Hellboy. Instinctively, Hellboy catches it. It smokes in his hand. He tosses it away. It lands next to the explosive belts. Hellboy opens his palm, seeing the smoking, charred imprint of the cross and beads. He looks over at Grigory. With a blood-curdling scream, Hellboy grabs his horns with both hands, brutally snaps them off. Energy spews from the stumps. He stabs Grigory with one of them. Grigory drops to his knees, holding his stomach. Hellboy drops the blood-stained horn. The final lock disappears into the stone. The light flickers and the connection with the moon is broken. Ilsa, licking her bloody lips, looks up. The sky is silent. The thunderclouds are parting. The eclipse has ended. Grigory crumples in agony. The burning glyphs in Hellboy's stone hand dim down, his features and body resume their usual shape. All is quiet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He breaks Myers' chains, helps him up.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The final seal. Open it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Hellboy) Remember who you are!!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You will never fulfill your destiny. You will never understand the power inside you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I can live with that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hellboy painfully takes Liz's limp body in his arms. Myers stands by his side. He kisses her forehead, caresses her hair, then walks down the steps. Myers steps on something. He looks under his foot: A smashed GLASS EYE. Then... out of the silence, a WHISPER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy turns. Grigory, on his knees, smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks up. In his empty eye socket, fleshy tendrils shift lazily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He uncovers his abdomen. Long, fleshy pseudopods spill out of the wound, like intestines. A large entity erupts from Grigory's torso and claws the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Covered in steamy slime, a seven foot, multi-tentacled shape -- BABY BEHEMOTH -- lands on the stone slab. The squirming flesh surges up like greasy pink foam. Growing exponentially by the second. Ilsa kneels and embraces Grigory's corpse. Kisses him on the mouth. A gargantuan tentacled shadow looms above them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A tower of flesh disdainfully crushes them both.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Child...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (dying) Look what you've done --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You've killed me -- an insignificant man... but you have brought forth a God.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Behold, my master, Behemoth. Guardian of thresholds, destroyer of worlds.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hell will hold no surprises for us.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: In a passageway, Hellboy carefully hands Liz's body over to Myers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As if in response, a massive tentacle fills the tunnel, reaching for him. Oil lamps hanging from the ceiling smash onto HELLBOY S head as he is pulled back at breakneck speed, finally confronting -- INT. THE CATACOMBS - NIGHT BEHEMOTH!!! The size of a house -- Hellboy -- head smoking -- writhes in the grip of the tentacle. It suddenly throws him toward the ceiling. As he arcs back down, ABM!! -- he cracks the floor wide open. Next to him: the rosary and the EXPLOSIVE BELTS. He tries to grab them. The tentacle slams down, blocking his way. The vibration sends the belts down into the crack. They bounce off a small ledge and land further down. Far below, grinding cogwheels and gears. Hellboy manages to pull a steel sword from the closest marble statue. Hellboy stands up and swings the sword for all he's worth. FWAP! He cuts clean through the tentacle. The tip hits the floor, rolling into the crack. From out of Behemoth's stump... a mass of wriggling tentacles replaces the cut-off section! They squirm around Hellboy's face as he slashes, again and again, fighting his way forward. He leans into the crack, stretches his arm, struggling to grab the belts. A few inches short. He jumps into the crevice, onto the first ledge. It crumbles!! The gears below grind a few falling bricks. The belts slide away. A tentacle captures Hellboy, pulls him up. At the last second, he grabs the belts with his tail. The beast raises Hellboy high. A multi-layered mouth opens in the body of BEHEMOTH. The most horrible proboscis ever seen. Hellboy's tail passes him the belts. The timers on them are crushed. A spark spurts: Useless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He wraps them around his stone arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He pulls the pin on all the explosives. BEHEMOTH drops him into a squid-like beak and gulps him down. After a moment, a weird gurgle emanates from the creature's innards. Then -- INT. CATACOMBS - NIGHT A surge of light roils within the thing, outlining the pulpy organs. The creature starts to burn.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Keep her safe. No matter what. I'll deal with whatever's back there.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Alone?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How big can it be?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They never work --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ugh -- Now, this is gonna hurt --
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . CATACOMBS - NIGHT A chain reaction yields a cacophony of explosions as Behemoth is enveloped in a cloud of fire, goo and soft flesh. Hellboy lands with a sickening, bone-crunching THUD!!! With a bellow, Behemoth goes down, the limp tentacles missing Hellboy as they vanish in a blaze of energy and light. Finally, just a few cinders of flesh float in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy stands, covered in goo. Two final shockwaves of light ripple over the ground.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Ouch -- It did hurt.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Hellboy lurches into the passageway and spots Myers. Painfully drags himself over. Liz's body is on the floor. Manning limps in from an adjacent room. Hellboy cradles Liz's head in his huge hand. Holds her against his powerful chest and whispers in her ear. A beat or two, then a moan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks at her, lovingly caressing her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Myers smiles. Liz looks at Hellboy for the first time as what he is: the man she loves. A warm, gentle fire rims her body. Manning watches. Agent Myers smiles a sad smile, illuminated by the flames. Hellboy and Liz kiss. The fire haloes them and builds as Tom Waits' CINNY'S WALTZ fills the air.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: In the dark -- I heard your voice -- What -- did you say -- ?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: "You, on the other side: let her go. Because for her, for her -- I'll die. I'll cross over." (beat) "And you'll be sorry I did."
dialogue.name: dialogue
